plugin.name: Spawn Terminal
plugin.description: A tiny plugin for Binary Ninja that enables the ui to spawn terminals on Ubuntu and OSX
plugin.longdescription: This plugin adds a spawn_terminal command to the script console. It probably won't be of much use on its own, but other plugins can use it to spawn terminals programatically.
